content.raw:
I'd much rather see this logic combined with the logic in Element::GetAny, since it is almost identical.  The differences are that it returns the default value if a real value isn't set, and that it does not call GetAny, and instead just returns the output from Get().

Part of the reason I am interested in that is that I just opened a different PR (#334) where I clean this logic up a bit, and I would rather it all remain in one place.
